main.title: I'm
main.description: I specialize in creating web applications using cutting-edge technologies and applying a creative approach to them.
main.quote: If you're afraid - don't do it, - if you're doing it - don't be afraid!

mandalorian.title: The Mandalorian
mandalorian.description: A game in which you have to save baby Grogu in the desert.

tic-tac.title: Tic tac toe
tic-tac.description: Game for two players who take turns marking the spaces in a three-by-three grid with X or O.

cloud-hub.title: Cloud hub
cloud-hub.description: Is a cloud service that allows users to store files on "cloud" servers and distribute them to other users on the Internet.

animal.title: Animal pedia
animal.description: introduce users to animals that are on the verge of extinction.

about-me.me: I'm a full-stack developer from Kazakhstan. My skills include not only creating web applications but also deploying them into production.
about-me.me2: I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

contact.text: I am interested in growth opportunities. However, if you have any other inquiries or questions, feel free to reach out to me.
